comment._content: What's the big plank doing sitting on the table when there's a perfectly good chair beside him to sit on?  He wouldn't do that in his own house!

comment._content: Unless his wife was really small... Think about that one! Altogether the studio here has a dusty feel to it, the rug to his left looks like its been saved from the tip and the whole place looks unkempt.
